regimeB2C: Telemarketing specifically regulated (Cabinet Resolution No. 56/2024)
optInOrOutB2C: opt-out via DNCR + explicit confirmation at start
regimeB2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
aiDisclosureRequiredYND: Depends (not AI-specific; must identify caller and ask to proceed)
existingRelationshipExemptionPlainText: DNCR blocks apply irrespective of relationship; caller must ask if the consumer wishes to continue before promoting.
knownExceptionsNotes: Natural persons may not call from personal numbers; frequency caps apply.
callerIDPrefixRules: Display company identity; no personal numbers; no spoofing.
recentChanges2024Plus: New telemarketing regime in force 2024-08-27 (call window, frequency limits, DNCR).
notesForProduct: Enforce 09:00–18:00; block DNCR; ask continuation before pitch; show CallerID with company name; treat B2B numbers conservatively if they may belong to individuals.

regimeB2C: Unsolicited calls/messages regulated by CST Anti-Spam framework
optInOrOutB2C: depends (consent required for automated; opt-out rules for others)
regimeB2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
existingRelationshipExemptionPlainText: No clear ER exemption published; comply with Anti-Spam obligations in all cases.
callerIDPrefixRules: CLI must be truthful; anti-spoofing enforced.
recentChanges2024Plus: CST Anti-Spam Regulations updated and consolidated (calls & messages) – ongoing enforcement.
notesForProduct: Do not use auto-dialed/recorded voice without prior consent; maintain clear opt-out; display valid CallerID.

regimeB2C: Unsolicited electronic communications regulated (CRA)
regimeB2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
existingRelationshipExemptionPlainText: Existing relationship does not remove duties (identification/consent/opt-out).
recentChanges2024Plus: CRA Anti-Spam/Unsolicited Communications regulation remains in force.
notesForProduct: Treat all outbound as consent-based unless documented opt-in; provide opt-out; avoid automated voice without opt-in.

regimeB2C: Consumer rights restrict unsolicited electronic messages (SMS/email); calls not specifically regulated
regimeB2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
existingRelationshipExemptionPlainText: No explicit ER exemption; comply with consumer rights.
notesForProduct: Avoid robocalls; treat live telemarketing as opt-out with clear stop mechanism; keep recordings off unless consent captured.

regimeB2C: TRA spam rules focus on unsolicited electronic messages; limited specifics on live calls
regimeB2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
existingRelationshipExemptionPlainText: ER does not waive identification/opt-out duties.
callerIDPrefixRules: True CLI; anti-spoofing enforced via licensees.
recentChanges2024Plus: No formal DNC; TRA consumer guidance ongoing.
notesForProduct: Prefer consent; provide opt-out; avoid automated voice without prior consent; display caller identity.

regimeB2C: Consumer protection & TRA complaint regime; no explicit telemarketing code
regimeB2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
existingRelationshipExemptionPlainText: ER does not remove duties.
notesForProduct: Use consent where feasible; provide opt-out; avoid robocalls.

regimeB2C: TRC guidance on nuisance calls/SMS; no telemarketing-specific law
regimeB2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
existingRelationshipExemptionPlainText: No ER carve-out; follow general consumer norms.
notesForProduct: Treat as opt-out with immediate stop; avoid automated voice; keep records.

regimeB2C: General consumer/data-protection principles; no specific telemarketing statute
regimeB2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
existingRelationshipExemptionPlainText: ER not codified for telemarketing.
notesForProduct: Apply conservative approach: consent where possible; clear opt-out; avoid robocalls.

regimeB2C: NTRA regulates promotional/commercial calls (registration & caller identification)
regimeB2B: No specific B2B telemarketing regulation found.
dncRegistryName: None (registry of calling numbers, not DNC)
aiDisclosureRequiredYND: Depends (not AI-specific; must identify caller/‘NTRA Alert’)
existingRelationshipExemptionPlainText: ER does not bypass registration/identification rules.
callerIDPrefixRules: Must display entity name or NTRA Alert; enforcement ongoing.
recentChanges2024Plus: NTRA regulations announced 2024-07-21; enforcement actions 2024-10 and 2025.
notesForProduct: Only use registered lines; ensure name display or NTRA Alert; avoid spoofing; capture consent if recording.
